snippet.title: Qld photographer on more child sex charges
snippet.content: A Queensland photographer who specialised in taking pictures of young children is alleged to have sexually abused seven boys and girls over almost two decades. The man was charged in July with dozens of counts of indecent treatment, carnal knowledge of children and stupefying alleged to occurred with multiple victims between 1997 and 2013. The 39-year-old was remanded in custody in the Brisbane Magistrates Court on Monday and will have his case return to court in September. (C) AAP 2017
